page.title: 12 Osborne House Visit (4)
page.content:
{The Drawing Room The Drawing Room is separated from the Billiard room by some imitation marble columns. The fireplace is made of marble with a huge mirror framed in gold above. There are statues all around the room and paintings on the walls. This is a very beautiful room.
{The Dinning Room Here you can see the Small chairs that belonged to the Royal children. Each chair has the name of the child carved on the back. The Queen layed in state in this room before being taken to Winsor. There are lots of pictures in here of the Queen's children.
